head.citation-title: Proceedings - 11th International Conference on Signal-Image Technology and Internet-Based Systems, SITIS 2015
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 124 papers. The topics discussed include: bag-of-visual words codebook development for the semantic content based annotation of images; fast intra coding based on reference samples similarity in HEVC; an optimal performance investigation for bilateral filter under four different image types; applying non linear approach for ECG denoising and waves localization; battery consumption of smartphone sensors; daylight spectrum estimation from hyper-and multispectral image without area extraction of uniform materials; estimation of aboveground biomass from satellite data using quaternion-based texture analysis of multi chromatic images; exploiting change blindness for image compression; detection and isolation of switches in point clouds of the German railway network; facial emotion recognition based on facial motion stream generated by Kinect; enhancement of latent fingerprint images with segmentation perspective; and partial face recognition based on template matching.
